roleset.name: to write (latin), label a prescription

example.name: Prescription label
example.text: Sig: I tab po qid pc& hs(translation: Label prescription: take one tablet by mouth 4 times a day, after meals and at bedtime)
example.arg: Sig: I tab po qid pc&

roleset.note: SIG-V NOTES: See VNcls scribble-25.2, performance-26.7, transfer_mesg-37.1.1, say-37.7, lecture-37.11. Not a member of VN currently. (from sig.01-v)
